channel.title: 2 exceptions [help?]
channel.description:
okay first exception is
[code] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18600) at client.packetProcess(client.java:21263) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:310) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
line 18600: [code] int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(castOnItem, 0, castOnSlot));[/code] normally these kinda exceptions ar eeasy, but the exception is dealing with an int = idfk...
okay 2nd exception, im just clueless... [code] java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:21241) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:310) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] line 21241: [code] packetType = packetType - inStreamDecryption.getNextKey() & 0xff;[/code]
>.> help?
rep++ 2 helpers

item.title: 2 exceptions [help?]
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

okay first exception is

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18600) at client.packetProcess(client.java:21263) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:310) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

line 18600:

int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(castOnItem, 0, castOnSlot));
normally these kinda exceptions ar eeasy, but the exception is dealing with an int = idfk…

okay 2nd exception, im just clueless…

java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:21241) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:310) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
line 21241:

packetType = packetType - inStreamDecryption.getNextKey() & 0xff;

.> help?

rep++ 2 helpers

Read full topic
